EmailTemplate.name: Preferred Price List (1566919225.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Preferred Price List (1566919225.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Jose,
I hope you are having a good week. Wanted to follow up with regards to your Preferred Price List with Grand & Toy. Would you like me to attach the pricing to your Grand & Toy Business account? Thank you.
Kind Regards, Kyle Kyle McGuire Business Development Manager, Canada 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 E-mail: kylemcguire@grandandtoy.com |Tel: 613-244-4023 Toll Free: 800-348-2184 ext. 44023 Fax: 613-244-0765 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]>
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
